name: Gone Fishing (matthewi)
description:
It may show a black screen as it loads!

Use your mouse to control your fishing hook. 

Click to reel in faster.

The fish that Scratchy is talking about sells for more cash! 

Buy upgrades to fish as deep as possible for more valuable fish! 

Made by Matthew, Brady, Brian, Jace, Jennifer, Christian, and Thomas for Ludum Dare 48, Deeper and Deeper.
